Trade/Device Name(s): OmegaPoint Systems Personal Breath Alcohol Tester BreathKeyT Model g10
OmegaPoint Systems Personal Breath Alcohol Tester BreathKeyT Model g30X
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for OmegaPoint Systems Personal Breath Alcohol Tester BreathKeyT Models g10 and g30X using electrochemical fuel cell technology to measure alcohol in human breath
Indications for Use Summary: Intended to measure alcohol in human breath for diagnosis of alcohol intoxication; Model g30X transmits BAC results to an interlock receiver installed in a motor vehicle
